code: import{Fraction}from'@uniswap/sdk-core';import JSBI from'jsbi';export function formatCurrencyAmount(amount,sigFigs){if(!amount){return'-';}if(JSBI.equal(amount.quotient,JSBI.BigInt(0))){return'0';}if(amount.divide(amount.decimalScale).lessThan(new Fraction(1,100000))){return'<0.00001';}return amount.toSignificant(sigFigs);}export function formatPrice(price,sigFigs){if(!price){return'-';}if(parseFloat(price.toFixed(sigFigs))<0.0001){return'<0.0001';}return price.toSignificant(sigFigs);}
